availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William O. Gilkey (Montgomery County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Merchant in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1850. Merchant in Montgomery County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 72A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 53.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, p. 244.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Edgar County, Ross, p. 221B.
"William Osborn Gilkey (1811-1881)," Find A Grave, Memorial 84919355, accessed October 25, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84919355.
